languages.text: {n}Иеронимус задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Следуй зову души, сестра. Реликварий Футфола пребудет в сохранности без твоего участия... как пребывал все годы до твоего прибытия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Иеронимус задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Следуй зову души, сестра. Реликварий Футфола пребудет в сохранности без твоего участия... как пребывал все годы до твоего прибытия".

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Следуй зову души, сестра. Реликварий Футфола пребудет в сохранности без твоего участия... как пребывал все годы до твоего прибытия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronimus nods in thought.{/n} "I cannot oppose the will of a righteous heart that wishes to bring its wrath upon the servants of Chaos. Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it had been over the years preceding your arrival."

{n}Hieronimus nods in thought.{/n} "I cannot oppose the will of a righteous heart that wishes to bring its wrath upon the servants of Chaos. Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it had been over the years preceding your arrival."

{n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "I cannot oppose the will of a righteous heart that wishes to bring its wrath upon the servants of Chaos. Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

{n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "I cannot oppose the will of a righteous heart that wishes to bring its wrath upon the servants of Chaos. Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

{n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

{n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯沉思地点了点头。{/n}“去追随你灵魂的召唤吧，修女。即便你不在这里，落脚港的圣骨匣也会安然无恙……就像你还没来这里的时候一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯沉思地点了点头。{/n}“去追随你灵魂的召唤吧，修女。即便你不在这里，落脚港的圣骨匣也会安然无恙……就像你还没来这里的时候一样。”

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus asiente, pensativo.{/n} «Siga la llamada de su alma, hermana. El relicario de Paso se conservará, con su contribución o sin ella... Así ha sido en los años previos a su llegada».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus asiente, pensativo.{/n} «Siga la llamada de su alma, hermana. El relicario de Paso se conservará, con su contribución o sin ella... Así ha sido en los años previos a su llegada».

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは熟考しながらうなずいた。{/n}「魂の呼びかけに従うのです、シスター。フットフォールの聖骨箱は、あなたの貢献がなくとも維持される…あなたが来てくださるまでと同様に守られ続けるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは熟考しながらうなずいた。{/n}「魂の呼びかけに従うのです、シスター。フットフォールの聖骨箱は、あなたの貢献がなくとも維持される…あなたが来てくださるまでと同様に守られ続けるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus nickt nachdenklich.{/n} "Folgt dem Ruf Eurer Seele, Schwester. Die Reliquie von Footfall wird auch ohne Euren Beitrag bewahrt – genau wie in all den Jahren vor Eurer Ankunft."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus nickt nachdenklich.{/n} "Folgt dem Ruf Eurer Seele, Schwester. Die Reliquie von Footfall wird auch ohne Euren Beitrag bewahrt – genau wie in all den Jahren vor Eurer Ankunft."

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus acquiesce, l'air songeur.{/n} « Suivez les inclinaisons de votre âme, ma sœur. Le reliquaire de Castel continuera d'exister même sans votre contribution... comme il l'a fait au fil des années avant votre arrivée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus acquiesce, l'air songeur.{/n} « Suivez les inclinaisons de votre âme, ma sœur. Le reliquaire de Castel continuera d'exister même sans votre contribution... comme il l'a fait au fil des années avant votre arrivée. »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus düşünceli şekilde başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Ruhunun çağrısına kulak ver Rahibe. Binliman kutsal emanet odası, katkıların olmaksızın da muhafaza edilecektir. Tıpkı gelişinden önceki yıllarda olduğu gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus nods in thought.{/n} "Follow the call of your soul, Sister. The Footfall reliquary will be preserved even without your contribution... as it was in all the years preceding your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus düşünceli şekilde onaylıyor.{/n} "Ruhun seni nereye götürüyorsa oraya git Rahibe. Binliman emanet odası senin katkıların olmaksızın da muhafaza edilecektir, tıpkı gelişinin öncesindeki yıllarda olduğu gibi."
